manifest_extension_description.message: Blocks websites which the user had not opened before.

blocked_header_logo_alt.description: img alt text of the logo on the blocked page.

blocked_header.description: Header text of the blocked page.

blocked_warning_text.message: You are trying to open a website which you have not opened before. Please verify that you really want to open this website; this might be a phishing attack.

blocked_warning_open_question.message: Do you want to open this website?

blocked_toggle_original_domain_label.description: Label of the button toggling the original domain.

blocked_toggle_original_domain_title.description: Hover title of the button toggling the original domain.

blocked_non_ascii_warning_text.message: The domain of the website uses special characters (replaced here with $NON_ASCII$), this is sometimes used to deceive users. To view the original domain, click the $EYE_ICON$ icon, but note that certain characters might completely change the way the text is displayed, such as changing the text direction.

blocked_button_open.description: Text of button for opening the blocked website.

blocked_button_back.description: Text of button for going back to the previous website.

blocked_button_close_tab.description: Text of button for closing the tab.
